row.process: ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! variables ! &KISS_HOSTNAME# ! VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY ! :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :SET &MY_DOMAIN#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,DOMAIN,1) :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,USER,1) :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,PASSWORD,1) :SET &MY_OU#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,OU,1) :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" write-host Add-Computer -DomainName &MY_DOMAIN# -DomainCredential &MY_USER# -OUPath "&MY_OU#" write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $RC=$? if ($RC) { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" echo $RC } else { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" echo $RC } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: ENREGISTREMENT AD &KISS_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,ENREGISTREMENT AD &KISS_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="ENREGISTREMENT AD &KISS_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: ENREGISTREMENT AD &KISS_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,ENREGISTREMENT AD &KISS_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
